University |only appearance = [[Past Tense]] |seasons = '''[[Private Practice|PP]]:''' [[Season 2 (Private Practice)|2]] |portrayed by = [[Ludwig Manukian]] }} '''Idrees Qalzai''' is the father of [[Sharbat Qalzai]]. ==History== Idrees came into the practice with his wife and daughter after his daughter, Sharbat, told him that she was having discomfort and that Addison was the top doctor for women. He asked Addison to give Sharbat her very best care, which she assured him she would. Unbeknownst to him, his daughter ultimately had a hymenoplasty in order to restore her hymen before marrying a man he had chosen back in Afghanistan, who would bring the family home and take care of them. ==Relationships== ===Romantic=== He is married to [[Amina Qalzai]]. ===Familial=== He and his wife moved their family to the US for their daughter Sharbat. Sharbat later decided to have surgery and marry a man she'd never met to allow her parents to move back to Afghanistan. ==Career== He is a cab driver. In Afghanistan, he taught university. {{DEFAULTSORT:Qalzai, Idrees}} [[Category:Characters]] [[Category:PP Characters]] [[Category:PP S2 Characters]]
